description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between Weibo Gaming and TOP Esports Armor in the King Pro League Stage 1 Group 1, scheduled for January 18 at 7:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Weibo Gaming" if Weibo Gaming wins 3 or more games than TOP Esports Armor in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "TOP Esports Armor".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "Weibo Gaming" if Weibo Gaming win against TOP Esports Armor in the named Honor of Kings match in the King Pro League Stage 1 Group 1, scheduled for January 18 at 7:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "TOP Esports Armor" if TOP Esports Armor win against Weibo Gaming in the Honor of Kings match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/honorofkings/Main_Page.
events.title: Honor of Kings: Weibo Gaming vs TOP Esports Armor (BO5) - King Pro League Stage 1 Group 1
